Name: Rayden Stormwind

Race: Human

Class: Sorcerer

Background: Noble

Alignment: Neutral Good

Ability Scores:

* Strength: 10
* Dexterity: 14
* Constitution: 12
* Intelligence: 16
* Wisdom: 10
* Charisma: 18

Skills: Arcana, Persuasion, Deception, History

Equipment:

* Quarterstaff
* Backpack
* Spell component pouch
* 2 Daggers
* Bedroll
* 10 Gold Pieces

Traits:

* Draconic ancestry: Your innate magic comes from the blood of dragons.
* Silver tongue: You are skilled at persuading others and bending them to your will.
* Wealth: You come from a wealthy background and are accustomed to a life of luxury.

Sorcerer spells:

1st Level: Magic Missile, Detect Magic, Chromatic Orb

2nd Level: Invisibility, Suggestion, Scorching Ray

3rd Level: Fireball, Fly, Lightning Bolt

4th Level: Polymorph, Dimension Door, Ice Storm

5th Level: Telekinesis, Dominate Person, Arcane Hand

Hit Points: 11

Armor Class: 12

Initiative: +2

Speed: 30 ft.

Saving Throws: Intelligence and Charisma

Attacks: Quarterstaff (1d6 bludgeoning damage) or Dagger (1d4 piercing damage)

Features and Traits:

* Draconic ancestry: Your innate magic comes from the blood of dragons. You can speak, read, and write Draconic.
* Silver tongue: You have proficiency in Persuasion and Deception.
* Wealth: You have a set of fine clothes, a signet ring, and a purse containing 25 gold pieces.
* Noble: You have a noble title, and you carry the trappings of your rank. You have access to the secret networks of the nobility, and you are accustomed to courtly life.

Rayden's ancestors may have had a distant relationship with dragons, such as interbreeding or being gifted with draconic magic. Alternatively, he could have been born with a rare genetic trait that manifests as draconic powers.
Rayden is currently a 1st level character. As he gains experience and completes quests, he will be able to increase his level and unlock new abilities.

As a 1st level Sorcerer, Rayden has 2 1st level spell slots and 1 2nd level spell slot. He can use these slots to cast the spells he knows or has prepared. As he levels up, he will gain additional spell slots of higher levels.

Rayden comes from a noble family with a long history of wealth and prestige. He was raised in luxury and received the best education and training available. However, he has always felt a sense of boredom and restlessness with the life of a noble, and he has been drawn to the thrill and adventure of being a sorcerer. He hopes to use his powers to make a name for himself and prove his worth to his family.

Rayden is a neutral good character, meaning that he is primarily motivated by his desire to do what is good and right. He believes in fairness and justice, and he is willing to take risks and make sacrifices to help those in need. He is also a strong believer in personal freedom and the rights of individuals, and he will not hesitate to challenge authority if he feels that it is being abused. Despite his noble upbringing, Rayden is not swayed by wealth or power, and he values honesty and integrity above all else.
